DynamicDataCapture.name: DynamicDataCapture
DynamicDataCapture.description: DynamicDataCapture is a junction object that adds a Form tab to Work Order Overview, and to the related list of a work order, work order line item, or service appointment in the Field Service mobile app.

ActionDefinition.description: The associated Data Capture Flow to execute.

ActionType.description: The type of platform action that the form is associated with. Possible values are:

ExecutionOrder.description: The order in which the Data Capture flow is executed. Positive integer values or null are supported.

IsRequired.description: Boolean value that specifies if this form needs to be completed before moving on to the next form.

LastReferencedDate.description: The order in which the Data Capture flow is executed. Positive integer values or null are supported.

OwnerId.description: The ID that refers to user who owns the Dynamic Data Capture object.

ParentRecordId.description: The ID that refers to a work order, work order line item, or service appointment that serves as the parent record for junction object.

ParentRecordType.description: The type of parent object associated with the junction object.

PausedFlowInterviewId.description: The ID of the flow interview that has been paused by a user.

ProcessType.description: The flow process type for the form.

StatusCategory.description: The category that each status value belongs to.
